abstract.p: Correction of statement attributed to one of 10 companies that Ceres, coalition of investor and environmental groups, has cited for not paying enough attention to global warming

block.p: An article in Business Day yesterday about 10 companies that Ceres, a coalition of investors and environmental groups, says may not be paying enough attention to global warming, rendered incorrectly a word in a quotation from Mary S. Wenzel of Wells Fargo, who discussed the bank's track record on green investing. She said, ''We are certainly demonstrating that we are addressing risk and seizing opportunities'' -- not ''ceasing'' opportunities.
